name: Innverse
description:
As a Mycelial Colony, you live a peaceful life, working to spread, consume, and dominate the land you inhabit. 

However, an invasive species known as "the Human" have come to disrupt your peaceful existence. Fight back against their invasion and spread your fungal network.

This demo started off as a submission for Global Game Jam 2023 but due to time constraints we decided to release this later with additional features!
